Class MenuBaseAdapter

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public abstract class MenuBaseAdapter
extends BaseAdapter
    Adds support for MenuItem transition

    Created by Kai-Chun Lin on 2015/5/11.
